member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.mergeMyPolygons(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon})
member.summary: Merges the polygons in a list todo of polygons. Two polygons can be merged if they are not disjoint and contain complementary links.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.makeHoles
member.summary: For each index in the dictionary, separates out any holes.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.makeHoles(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon},System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon})
member.summary: Separates out the holes in a list of polygons. There may be more than one hole in a polygon, and holes may be split into several holes. A polygon contains a hole if it contains two non-adjacent complementary links.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.FinishShapes
member.summary: Finish by merging shapes and making holes

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.makeString
member.summary: Generate a string for all the polygons. For each grid value: 1. A line stating its value 2. A set of lines, one for each polygon for that value.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.GridToShapeManhattan
member.summary: Converts grid to a shapefile, replacing any existing shapefile. Assumed to be an integer grid. Attribute "BasinID" is populated with the grid values Attribute "AREA" is populated with the area of each polygon.
member.returns: null if any errors, else FeatureSet

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.ManhattanShapes.GridToShapeManhattan(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts grid to a shapefile, replacing any existing shapefile. Assumed to be an integer grid. Attribute GridValueFieldName is populated with the grid values Attribute "AREA" is populated with the area of each polygon.
member.returns: null if any errors, else FeatureSet

summary.para: ManhattanShapes are polygons with only vertical or horizontal lines in their perimeters. Lists of ManhattanShapes are the parts of a shape. Each collection of parts is associated with a particular integer index, representing a particular grid value.
The algorithm to make the polygons from a grid of cells, each polygon indexed by the grid value it belongs to is:
1. Make the basic (horizontal) boxes for each index. These boxes are unit height and integer width, and located by row and column number, so that the next two steps only require integer arithmetic.
2. Merge the boxes for each index
3. Make the holes for each index
4. Convert the polygons into lists of points, the format for a shape in a shapefile

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink
member.summary: Links are unit length directed lines, positioned in a cartesian grid using integer coordinates. Up and down links are positioned by their bottom ends. Left and right links are positioned by their left ends. This means links complement (cancel out when in sequence) if they have the same position but opposite directions.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.merge(DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon,System.Int32,DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon,System.Int32)
member.summary: Makes a single polygon from two polygons p1 and p2 with complementary links at index i1 of perimeter of p1 and i2 of perimeter of p2. Also removes any adjacent complementary links in the result.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.canMerge(DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon,System.Int32@,DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns true if p1 and p2 are not disjoint and have complementary links at indexes i1 and i2 of their perimeters

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.removePairs(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink},System.Int32)
member.summary: If links at indexes i and i+1 are complementary, removes them. Recurses on links originally at i-1 and i+2 if i > 0 and i < l.Count - 2 Precondition: 0 <= i < l.Count - 1, ie i and i+1 are indexes of l

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.removeFirstLast(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink})
member.summary: Removes the first and last links if they complement, and repeats. Precondition: l.Count > 1

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.rotate(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink})
member.summary: If a chain of links representing a closed polygon has the first and last links the same direction, this function puts the head of the chain to the back, and repeats. This does not affect the polygon, but will reduce by one the number of points representing it.
member.param: Chain of links representing a closed polygon

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.makeHole(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink}@)
member.summary: List l has a link at first complemented by a link at last, where first less than last. This removes first to last inclusive and makes a hole which is the list from first+1 to last-1 inclusive. If the complementary links are adjacent the hole will be null. Precondition: 0 <= first < last <= l.Count - 1

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.hasHole(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink},System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns true if it finds a link complemented by a later one. Then first is set to the index of the first link, and last to the index of the complementing one.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanPolygon.makeString(System.Collections.Generic.List{DotSpatial.Plugins.Taudem.Port.manhattanCustomLink})
member.summary: Generate a string for display of a polygon l, in the the form of a start point plus a string of direction letters. This function is intended for debugging. It also checks the polygon is connected and closed.
